name: DailyGobble, Inc.
description: Developer of customized loyalty applications designed to connect customers to the brands. The company's holistic technology platform provides a customized mobile applications that offer loyalty, guest feedback, ordering, mobile payment and gift cards which are integrated into the point-of-sale for a seamless in-store execution, enabling brands to better understand and engage with their customers.
